title: LeaderTask Company Management 6.1
description:
LeaderTask Company Management 6.1 is a program for managing the activity of a group of people ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ both small teems and large organizations. It can increase the efficiency of both your employees and the company as a whole. LeaderCommand is an effective solution for managing an enterprise.

LeaderTask Company Management Advantages:

    * Neither a server nor any additional configuration is required. To organize team management, it is enough just to install LeaderCommand on team membersÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ computers connected to the local area network. LeaderCommand will automatically detect team members over the network.
    * LeaderCommand can run in the local and network mode. In the local mode, LeaderCommand is used as your personal organizer and project manager.
    * The number of members on the LeaderCommand network is unlimited.
    * You can connect new members to the LeaderCommand network at any time.



LeaderTask Company Management Key Features:

    * Multi-user tasks management system for the companyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s employees simultaneous use. (Tasks management system).
    * Real-time project management.
    * Task assignment: the responsible person, terms, priorities, attitude to projects, categories.
    * Monitoring all assigned tasks: what tasks are in progress, what stage they are at, tasks history, etc.
    * Monitoring the workload of the companyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s staff.
    * Evaluating every employeeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s efficiency.
    * Comprehensive overview of the companyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s current affairs, even if you are away for a long period of time.
    * Regular reports on employeesÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ work
    * Clear overview of tasks from customers: who ordered (assigned), terms, priority, task details.
    * Effective team cooperation: quick message, file, note, document exchangeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦
    * Information access according to the particular userÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s rights. E.g. employees have access only to the tasks delegated to them, while only the owner has access to the entire database.
    * Communication history: employees, partners, customers, suppliers.
    * Complete history of tasks, projects, messages, employees.
    * Managing documents sorted according to clients, projects, time, priority.
    * Replacing paper reports from managers

System Requirements:  	 
Windows Me, Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows 2003, Windows Vista; 15 Mb Hdd; 64Mb RAM

Homepage: http://www.leadercommand.com/
